statements: UPDATE employee_records SET name='Alice', skill_set='Java, Python' WHERE employee_id=123;
UPDATE employee_records SET certifications='{"AWS","Azure"}', training_records='{"Java Basics","Python Advanced"}' WHERE employee_id=456;
UPDATE employee_records SET name = 'John Doe', skill_set = 'Software Development' WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE employee_records SET certifications = ARRAY['Java', 'Python', 'SQL'], training_records = '{
'session_1': {'course': 'Python Programming', 'trainer': 'Alice Smith'},
'session_2': {'course': 'Data Structures', 'trainer': 'Bob Johnson'}
} WHERE employee_id = 102;
UPDATE employee_skills SET skill_set='Java, Python' WHERE employee_id=101;
UPDATE training_records SET training_description='Advanced SQL training' WHERE employee_id=201;
UPDATE employee_skills SET skill_set = 'Java, Python, SQL' WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE employee_certifications SET certification_name = 'AWS Certified Developer' WHERE employee_id = 201;
UPDATE employee_skill_sets SET skill_set = 'SQL, Python' WHERE employee_id = 123;
UPDATE employee_certifications SET certification_name = 'Machine Learning' WHERE certification_id = 456;
UPDATE employee_skill_sets SET skill_set='Java, Python, SQL' WHERE employee_id=123
UPDATE employee_certifications SET employee_id=456, certification_name='Certified Scrum Master' WHERE certification_id=789
UPDATE employee_skills SET skill_set = 'Java, C++, Python' WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE employee_training SET training_description = 'Advanced Leadership Training' WHERE employee_id = 2;
UPDATE employee_skills SET skill_set = 'Python, Java, SQL' WHERE employee_id = 123;
UPDATE employee_training SET training_date = '2022-05-10', training_description = 'Advanced Leadership Training' WHERE employee_id = 456;
UPDATE EmployeeSkills SET proficiency_level = 3, last_updated = '2022-09-15' WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE EmployeeWorkSchedules SET start_time = '08:00:00', end_time = '17:00:00', working_days = 'Monday-Friday' WHERE employee_id = 201;
UPDATE EmployeeSkills SET proficiency_level = 5, last_updated = '2022-10-15 08:00:00' WHERE employee_id = 12345;
UPDATE EmployeeWorkHistory SET position = 'Senior Developer', start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE employee_id = 54321;
